column5: So I kept my boy home from daycare today to have a guys day... This included a trip to NY state to pick up some fishing gear...  On the way over the fella working the toll booth had brought in Halloween chips to give to kids crossing the bridge....  I just thought it was really nice... No matter how it was funded....  Little things like that can make a kids day and you don't see those gestures very often....  Needless to say my little fella loved the mini Doritos...  Thanks toll booth guy
Halloween brings the kid outta all of us I only have $120 dollars worth of candy left to eat now 8-(
Security at the border must be tight if they're only handing out 'mini doritos'.
All I got was a little yellow slip that said I owed $60 ...
This was the toll booth... Not customs....  And they were also nice... $120 in gear... No tax...
